com.skobbler.ngx.search

Class SKSearchManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skobbler.ngx.search.SKSearchManager

  • public class SKSearchManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles search methods
    Version:
    2.5

    SKSearchManager class provides services for searching POIs and addresses.

    Important: SKSearchManager supports one search at a time. If multiple search requests were started, only the latest request will be processed.
    Usage:
    1. Adopt the SKSearchListener, and implement the protocol methods to receive search results
    2. The caller object should set itself as the listener: SKSearchManager.getInstance().setSearchListener(this)
    3. Send a search request:
    e.g. SKSearchManager.getInstance().nearbySearch(nearbySearchObject)
    4. Receive the search results:
    void onReceivedSearchResults(final List places){ }
    5.Cancel an ongoing search request if needed. (before sending a new search request, if the caller object is destroyed before the search results arrive) SKSearchManager.getInstance().cancelSearch().

      • setSearchListener

        public void setSearchListener(SKSearchListener searchListener)
        Sets the new search listener
        Parameters:

      • nearbySearch

        public SKSearchStatus nearbySearch(SKNearbySearchSettings nearbySearchObj)
        Search for streets and POIs around a position. Only one search operation is possible at the time.This automatically cancel any previous search.
        Parameters:
        nearbySearchObj - contains input information about a nearby search . See SKNearbySearchSettings
        Returns:
        search status . See SKSearchStatus

      • multistepSearch

        public void multistepSearch(SKMultiStepSearchSettings stepObject)
        Search after an address step by step (Country->City->Street). When the search had finish the callback SKSearchListener.onReceivedSearchResults(List) is called. Only one search operation is possible at the time.This automatically cancel any previous search.
        Parameters:
        stepObject - contains information about a step by step search object. See SKMultiStepSearchSettings

      • cancelSearch

        public void cancelSearch()
        Cancels the previously initiated search.
